title: Getting banned for no reason
body: Riot I need help. While I was playing a game yesterday LoL kicked me out of the game beacause something happened. The next day i went online and it gave me a 20 minute leave buster ban for 5 times. I've already went through one of them but I need the rest to go beacause I find it not fair that LoL kicked me out of a game and then banned me for leaving. Thank you

replies.body:
When you disconnect from a match, it will negatively affect everyone in it, regardless if it was intentional or not. This is one reason why the system treats all disconnections equally and why modifications cannot be made to any penalties. The only way to get rid of the penalties is to play consistently without disconnecting. More information on the Leaverbuster system can be found [in our FAQ.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752714-LeaverBuster-FAQ)

Disconnections can be caused by a number of factors, but the leading cause is an issue with your connection to the servers. Our [connection troubleshooting guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) goes over the more common solutions. 

Let me know if this helped.

LeaverBuster does not issue penalties for one or a few leaves, especially the 20 minute penalty. You would need to accumulate many leaves to reach the 20 minute queue. 

The punishments will not be lifted.
